title: FIFA World Cup 2014 - QF UpTo Brazil Columbia France Germany
description:
World Cup 2014
 
[b]Match only - No Pundits - English Commentary From ITV and BBC[/b] 

 

 


[b]These are posted as MpgII for speed
Many are watching the last match 60 minutes after the Whistle
Want mkv, mp4 - wait a few hours for someone else to encode it
 
This is and will be .,. Mpeg
[/b] 
 
 
 
[b][color=blue]Warnings: 

Any more of these silly complaints or Torrent Voted BAD
And I WILL stop, no more warnings



Complaints examples (Swear words left out)

Video 1 Audio 1 (No point in me posting if they are really Video 1 Audio 1) 
Why have I not included "The National Anthems" (< Yes really)
Why am I not seeding 
(In fact every torrent was FULLY seeded by me in less than 45 mins of posting)
(Many are watching the matches 60 minutes after the final whistle)[/color][/b]



 

[b][color=red]I'm not going to spend up to 8 hours (4 matches of my time for this kind of abuse.
Any more and I WILL stop posting them[/color][/b]
 
 



There is no point in posting
I want mkv, I want mp4, I want, I want
 
It ain't gonna happen from me.
This is how I post this torrent, Don't like it, move on

Use the SEARCH 
 
This is for those who want the matches fast

STOP PM;ing me to post as SINGLE matches
It ain't gonna happen (Don't click the Magnet Link)
 

=================================================
 
I hope to be posting ALL the matches
 
They will be MpgII for speed
 
I can usually post in under 30 minutes of the final Whistle, if all goes well
(My record is 8 Minutes from whistle to posting)
 
 
[color=red][b]If you are following this torrent you should only be downloading and seeding 1 version, the LATEST
 
Don't worry if you have not completed the last 1
The latest torrent will Carry On where you were and Add the latest game[/b][/color]
 
 

[color=blue][b]I find best played with Windows Media Player[/b][/color]
 
 

Don't want MPEG - Wait a few hours and someone might post the format you want
 
I cap these for ME I just happen to share with you.
 
 
[color=red][b]Speed up your download
Stop all other torrents[/b]
 [/color]
 

=================== What's In This Torrent ===================
 
[color=red][b]If you're looking for the Group Matches search for

 
FIFA World Cup 2014 -All 48 Group A to H Games - English

 
 


We are at the stages where there can not be a draw
Extra Time and Penalty Shoot-Out may add 1 hour to each game 


 
[/b] [/color] 


 

 

 
World Cup 2014 - 57 - France v Germany - 04-July-2014
World Cup 2014 - 58 - Brazil v Columbia - 04-July-2014 

 
 
=================== Radio Commentary 96k MP3 ===================
 
The BBC run a automated system for uploading these Commentary's
Dispite sending 1000's of people to Brazil to cover the games 
They could not leave 1 person in the UK to hit the record button

Sometimes the start might be missing a minute or 2
 
Sometimes the end might be missing 30 Minutes
(Yes 30 Minutes because the BBC seem to have forgotten in the last stages there can not be a draw - 30 Minutes Extra Time - Penalty Shoot-Out)

Too much missing and I will not post it
Pointless if you will not get the last 30 Minutes of the game 
 
 
 

World Cup 2014 - 57 - France v Germany - 04-July-2014
